title: Best Friends Forever
description: Where is Samantha? That's what Cassie wants to know... but when a strange boy approaches Cassie after the football game her entire world gets torn apart. She finds her self tied up, naked and blindfolded... and still has no idea what happened to Samantha... Can she find her best friend? Can she get out alive? This SPECIAL EDITION of Best Friends Forever includes SNEAK PEAK PREVIEWS of Bruce's full length Towering Pines Volume Room 509 and Philadelphia A Lance Carter Detective Novel!
author: Bruce A. Sarte
